      • changeToAddRequestMode

        public void changeToAddRequestMode​(Controller c,
                                   Window w)
        Description copied from interface: State
        Method called by the controller after a click on the button "Add". It changes the State to AddRequestState where the user can add a new request to the existing tour.
        Parameters:
        c - controller
        w - the window

      • exportTourFile

        public void exportTourFile​(Controller c,
                           Window w)
        Description copied from interface: State
        Method called by the controller after a click on the button "Export Tour File". Exports the delivery tour as a description of the steps of the tour to take to a file.
        Parameters:
        c - controller
        w - the window
